title: Peggy Lee,George Shearing quintet;BEAUTY andtheBEAT(1959)
description:
A carefully contrived "live" album performed ostensibly for a convention of Disc 

Jockeys in Miami, Florida but in reality edited into being in a recording studio

from bits of canned applause and even between-song commentaries by Ms Lee and

George Shearing.  


I've always cringed at the harsh/strident applause on this record but didn't learn

the truth about it until researching it for this upload.


Notwithstanding the truth, the "product" really seems to capture the great appeal

of Peggy Lee, singer/songwriter performing.
